document.full_text: federal telecommunications regulators have asked at&t inc for more information on its planned merger with t-mobile usa, including claims on spectrum shortages, coverage overlaps and plans to close facilities.
document.title: fcc asks at&t about spectrum claims
lines_and_colors: federal telecommunications regulators have asked at&t inc for more information on its planned merger with t-mobile usa, including claims on spectrum shortages, coverage overlaps and plans to close facilities.
